statements: SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_forecast > 100
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, product_name FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_forecast >= 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, product_name FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_forecast < 50 ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_forecast BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_forecasts FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_forecast >= 0
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast, created_at FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_name ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, product_name, forecasted_demand, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount, sale_date FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_name LIKE '%product%' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_forecasts FROM demand_forecasting GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_forecasts DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, forecasted_demand, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, forecasted_demand DESC
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sale_date FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM historical_sales WHERE sales_amount > 500 AND product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT id, product_name, forecasted_demand, forecast_date FROM demand_forecasting WHERE product_name = 'Product X' AND forecast_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY forecast_date ASC

SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand, sale_date FROM demand_forecasting INNER JOIN historical_sales ON demand_forecasting.product_name = historical_sales.product_name ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC, sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_data;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM demand_forecasting_data ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT products.name, sales_orders.order_date, sales_orders.order_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN sales_orders ON products.id = sales_orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting_data WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecasting_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_demand DESC
SELECT products.name, products.category, sales_orders.order_date, sales_orders.order_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN sales_orders ON products.id = sales_orders.product_id
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_quantity DESC
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products
SELECT ProductID, Date, ForecastValue FROM DemandForecasting;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE ProductName = 'Product A';
SELECT SaleID, SaleDate, SaleAmount FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleDate DESC;
SELECT ProductID, StockQuantity FROM Inventory WHERE StockQuantity > 100;
SELECT ProductName, ForecastValue FROM Products JOIN DemandForecasting ON Products.ProductID = DemandForecasting.ProductID;
SELECT ProductName, StockQuantity FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.ProductID = i.ProductID
SELECT ProductName, SaleDate, SaleAmount FROM Products p JOIN SalesData s ON p.ProductID = s.ProductID
SELECT ProductName, ForecastValue FROM Products p JOIN DemandForecasting d ON p.ProductID = d.ProductID
SELECT p.ProductName, s.SaleAmount, d.ForecastValue FROM Products p JOIN SalesData s ON p.ProductID = s.ProductID JOIN DemandForecasting d ON p.ProductID = d.ProductID
SELECT ProductName, SaleDate, ForecastValue FROM Products p JOIN SalesData s ON p.ProductID = s.ProductID JOIN DemandForecasting d ON p.ProductID = d.ProductID
SELECT * FROM ProductDetails ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM ProductDetails WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT * FROM ProductDetails WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT product_name FROM ProductDetails WHERE unit_price < 20 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM ProductDetails
SELECT * FROM ProductDetails WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM ProductDetails WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM ProductDetails WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT MAX(unit_price) AS max_unit_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_unit_price FROM ProductDetails;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM ProductDetails;
